page.title: 06Sarn Holy Trinity Church
page.content: Sarn is a small place,but has two holy places-a church and a chapel.The{ {church}was built about 1860,and holds about 150 people.Basically there are two rooms,the main body and a vestry. In the church there is an old{font} which belonged to the 13th Century Chapel of Llanfihangel near Gwernygo in Sarn parish.The{organ}which was erected in 1931,used to have a hand pump,but now is worked by electricity. Over the altar is a large{ {stained-glass window}showing Jesus blessing the children,and his Ascension.There are two other windows, with pictures of St.George and St.Michael.There is a{Family Service} once a month, and a Communion Service on the other Sundays.The vicar lives four miles away, and has to take services at three different churches.
